channel.title: Releases on Byte Arena Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Byte Arena Docs

item.title: v0.0.10 Changelog
item.description: Features core#7 improved debug log ba#36 Assert docker version ba#39 Refactor: replaced –dump-raw-comm by –debug Fixes core#6 [deathmatch] Get rid of Title case in protocol messages core#5 [deathmatch] Get rid of Title case in messages ba#38 Get rid of titlecase in communications go-sdk#1 Updated SDK to match latest API.

item.title: v0.0.6 CLI Changelog
item.description: Features Visualization ByteArena/viz#4 Store user prefs (zoom and camera) Show the agent name Show the score Improved UI ba train Adding events into the perception Added agent gear specifications Sending shooting specification to the agent Bug Fixes ba train Show the CLI usage when no agent is specified Default TPS is now 20 Get rid of NaN values in the perception ba map Recover when the map file is corrupted ba build Fixed building .

item.title: v0.0.7 CLI Changelog
item.description: Fix Visualization ByteArena/viz#10 zoom/change camera using shortcuts on Firefox ByteArena/viz#9 model.json cannot be decoded under Firefox bytearena-sdk Renamed the takeActions method into do ba train Renamed the mutations key in the protocol into actions. Features ByteArena/ba#28 agent manifest ba train ByteArena/ba#24 color output in the console Visualization Camera: change which agent you follow Show game events

item.title: v0.0.8 CLI Changelog
item.description: Features ba train ByteArena/ba#31 Allow to specify a ip to bind to for the viz (--viz-host)

item.title: v0.0.9 CLI Changelog
item.description: Features ba train ByteArena/ba#34 quiet mode for output (--quiet)
